name: Animal Daedal
description:
This game has been made by 1 person. It's a small project that has been made to be pretty chill and pleasing to play. I hope you will like the game !

It can be played with the keyboard or a gamepad, here's the buttons:

Keyboard :                                  
Move  : Arrow keys         
Reset the current level : R       
Undo one move : U
Level selection menu : Escape    
Options : O
                                      
Gamepad :
Move : Sticks or DPad
Reset the current level : Y
Undo one move : B
Level selection menu : Start/Options
Options : Select/Back
